hero.name: Minoltan Issack
hero.about: I'm a results-driven Software Engineer with a strong background in architecting, designing, developing, and testing scalable, high-performance backend systems. My core expertise lies in AWS Cloud and Serverless architectures, where I build robust, cloud-native solutions. I have extensive experience with Java, leveraging it to build secure, efficient, and maintainable backend services across a variety of enterprise-grade applications. I'm highly adaptable to diverse tech stacks and currently focused on AWS Serverless development, with a keen interest in Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications. Holding a B.Sc. (Hons) in Software Engineering from the University of Kelaniya, I combine a solid academic foundation with practical experience, and I enjoy contributing to the tech community through technical blogging.

about_me.description: A results-driven Software Engineer with expertise in architecting and developing scalable backend systems using AWS Serverless and Java. Proficient in cloud-native solutions and enterprise-grade applications, with a strong foundation in software engineering. Holds a B.Sc. (Hons) from the University of Kelaniya. Passionate about AI/ML and actively contributes to research and innovation.

academic.description: I earned my B.Sc. (Hons) in Software Engineering from the University of Kelaniya, a recognized state university governed by the University Grants Commission of Sri Lanka. During my studies, I actively engaged in academic and extracurricular activities, including hackathons and tech events. For my final-year research, I developed a machine learning model that predicts and assigns a quantitative score for parking slot availability, combining practical problem-solving with AI techniques.

Highly motivated and detail-oriented individual with a robust foundation in Physical Sciences (Combined Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry) and demonstrated leadership capacity, notably as a School Prefect. My diverse extracurricular engagement includes competing at the National Level in Chess and playing Cricket at the Provincial Level. I am currently leveraging this academic rigor and competitive drive in the pursuit of a B.Sc. (Honors) degree in Software Engineering at the University of Kelaniya.

company.name: Arimac Lanka Pvt. Ltd. Colombo. Sri Lanka

work_experience.description: As a Senior Software Engineer at Arimac, Sri Lanka’s premier digital solutions provider, I specialize in architecting and developing scalable, serverless, cloud-native solutions using event-driven and microservice architectures across AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. I possess deep proficiency in backend development with Node.js and Spring Boot (Java), leveraging containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and managing diverse databases like MySQL, MongoDB, and DynamoDB. My robust workflow adheres to Test-Driven Development (TDD) using tools like JUnit and SonarQube, and I ensure streamlined deployments through CI/CD pipelines (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), actively contributing to DevOps practices via Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform, AWS CDK). Furthermore, I play a key leadership role in multiple Agile projects, consistently ensuring timely delivery, which has led to internal recognition for my commitment to engineering best practices and problem-solving excellence.

company.name: Arimac Lanka Pvt. Ltd. Colombo. Sri Lanka

work_experience.description: As a Software Engineer, I collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to develop both monolithic and microservice-based applications, integrating RESTful and SOAP APIs. I was responsible for backend development using Java (Spring Boot) and also contributed to frontend development using React.js. I consistently applied Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and SOLID principles to produce clean, modular, and maintainable code. I implemented authentication and authorization mechanisms using OAuth2, Spring Security, and Keycloak, along with encryption techniques to ensure secure data handling. Working in Agile environments, I practiced effective version control using Git, actively participated in code reviews, and contributed to design discussions and stakeholder presentations.

company.name: HCL Tech Pvt. Ltd. Colombo. Sri Lanka

work_experience.description: As a Associate Software Engineer, I specialized in monitoring and ensuring the reliability of critical transaction pipelines for a major US-based insurance system. My core responsibilities included the proactive identification and debugging of pipeline failures, requiring swift analysis and implementation of effective technical fixes to maintain system continuity. This role significantly expanded my technical skill set, establishing strong proficiency in MySQL database management and expertise in data integration processes utilizing the Informatica toolset

company.name: SenzMate Pvt. Ltd. Colombo. Sri Lanka

work_experience.description: During my internship at SenzMate, I contributed to web and mobile application development using React.js and Spring Boot as part of a cross-functional team. I engaged in full-stack development tasks, including UI implementation, API integration, and backend service development. Through real-world projects, I gained hands-on experience in building AI- and IoT-integrated applications. I participated in a structured intern training program, which significantly enhanced my practical skills and supported my final-year academic success. Throughout the internship, I followed best practices in version control, code quality, and Agile workflows.

projects_overview.title: Things I’ve Built
projects_overview.description: Fun, innovative, and creative projects that showcase my skills and expertise.

list.title: Keells Millionaire
list.description: In the competitive retail landscape, creating memorable customer experiences that drive both engagement and sales is the holy grail of marketing. For three consecutive years, IMI Games has partnered with Keells - one of Sri Lanka's leading supermarket chains - to transform routine shopping trips into exciting, reward-filled adventures through the Keells Millionaire campaign..
features: Digital slot-machine game that turned traditional retail shopping into an interactive experience
Nexus Loyalty Customers who spent over LKR 3,000 were qualified to play
Game links were delivered instantly via SMS after checkout
Players could win various prizes, including the grand prize of 1 Million LKR
The experience was seamlessly integrated with Keells' Nexus loyalty program

client.name: John Keells

list.title: Dialog Mega Games
list.description: When Dialog, Sri Lanka's top Telco, wanted to enhance their WOW super-app, they turned to us for a solution. Enter “Dialog Mega Games” - a hyper-casual gaming portal designed to bring a new level of fun to the app and engage users in a fresh way.
features: 8,000,000 Monthly gaming sessions + 280,000 monthly active users
hyper-casual gaming portal designed to bring a new level of fun
Secured Authorization and Authentication using Keycloak

list.title: Future Us
list.description: Working with the World Health Organization (WHO) Western Pacific Office, and our partner VS One World (www.vsoneworld.com), we at IMI Games, a subsidiary of Arimac Lanka (Pvt) Ltd, have successfully delivered an innovative digital solution to engage youth in shaping the future of health. Our latest project, “Future Us,” is a vibrant metaverse world built on the popular platform Zepeto. This initiative aims to empower young voices to envision a healthier tomorrow, and we're excited to share the impact it has already begun to make!
features: We crafted “Future Us” as an engaging and dynamic environment within Zepeto, incorporating visually captivating elements and immersive interactive features to ensure a truly unique experience
The metaverse world blends educational content with entertainment, keeping the spirit of youth alive while addressing serious topics like health promotion and policy advocacy.
The solution is a testament to our ability to translate complex concepts into accessible, digital-first experiences that resonate with young audiences.

list.title: Innovate Digital Quiz
list.description: When Atlas Axillia's premium brand Innovate hosted its activation on February 20, 2025, the event welcomed 450 students from 50 schools, all eager to explore their unique personality types through the quiz. Designed to match students with Innovate book covers based on their personality traits, the quiz was accessible through a large LED screen and handheld tablets. The LED display quickly became the highlight, drawing long lines of students excited to see their personality match on the big screen.
features: The quiz featured a set of carefully designed questions that identified 20 unique personality types, ranging from The Creator (artistic and expressive) to The Strategist (tactical and resourceful.
To ensure a seamless experience, the quiz was designed to display only available book covers, so every student received a book that was in stock.

By integrating personalization and technology, this digital quiz helped Innovate create a deeper connection with students, turning a simple stationery interaction into an engaging and memorable moment.

list.title: HIRU TV Election Broadcasting
list.description: Elections are a cornerstone of democracy, and accurate, real-time dissemination of election results is crucial for transparency and public engagement. At IMI Games and Arimac, we were privileged to contribute to this process as the technical solution provider for Hiru TV, the first digitally-enabled high-definition live TV channel in Sri Lanka, during several major elections.
features: Local Government Election 2025
General Election 2024
Presidential Election 2024

list.title: Advergames
list.description: Advergames are every marketer's dream - and we're here to make that dream a reality.
features: Harpo's Pizza Rush
A subtle way of educating customers on pizza offerings and the process involved in making Harpo's pizza

list.title: Reciper Agent
list.description: This restaurant chat app utilizes AWS S3 Vector Buckets to provide a cost-effective, high-performance solution for accessing proprietary culinary data, such as secret recipes and specific kitchen protocols. By integrating Amazon Bedrock with S3’s native vector storage, the app performs rapid semantic searches on unstructured documents like PDF cookbooks to deliver accurate, hallucination-free answers with sub-second latency. Acting as an intelligent AI chef bot, it combines the power of large language models with a restaurant's private knowledge base to ensure customers and staff receive precise, brand-consistent information in a warm and conversational tone.
features: Proprietary Knowledge Integration
Cost-Efficient Semantic Search
Intelligent AI Chef Bot
Context-Aware Engagement:

blogs.title: S3 Vector Buckets: The Game-Changer for Building Cost-Effective GenAI Applications
blogs.description: This restaurant chat app leverages AWS S3 Vector Buckets and Amazon Bedrock to provide a cost-effective AI chef bot that delivers instant, accurate answers based on proprietary restaurant recipes and manuals.

blogs.title: How big companies manage prize and prevent duplication at scale
blogs.description: The article describes a serverless spin-wheel system using AWS Lambda and DynamoDB. It prevents prize duplication during high traffic using atomic database operations to solve race conditions.

blogs.title: Enhanced Streak System for Game Portal with Leaderboards & Rewards
blogs.description: The article details a serverless game streak system using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway to track daily logins and wins, offering features like streak freezes and automated rewards

reviews.review: It’s been a real pleasure to meet Minoltan. From the very beginning, I could see his genuine curiosity and eagerness to learn. He approaches every conversation with an open mind and a great attitude, always looking for ways to grow and put new insights into practice.

Minoltan is one of the good Software Engineers I've worked with. He consistently demonstrated a solid work ethic at SenzMate and also a commitment to success. Loyal, insightful and independent. His organizational skills have been invaluable to the company.

Paul Minoltan is a very intelligent and technical advocate. He has the ability to work as a team, under any pressure and also has a problem solving skills.Would recommend his style and methods of working.He deserves all the credits.

end: Thank you for exploring my journey. The best is yet to come.
